title: Thrombotic thrombocytopenic purpura
definition: Life-threatening thrombotic microangiopathy from severe ADAMTS13 deficiency or inhibition leading to ultra-large vWF multimers, platelet-rich microthrombi, thrombocytopenia, and microangiopathic hemolytic anemia with organ ischemia.

image.alt: TTP with platelet microthrombi due to ADAMTS13 deficiency
